data.text:
@NolifeNoone I understand and even agree with that mind-set but I just think a show like Resistance, with a plot like Resistance, should have a darker tone. It should match the tone of the Sequels which is "Somewhat dark with lighthearted moments mixed in"

Just my personal opinion, obviously

@PerfectHarb I personally never had a problem with its tone. I always felt that a show or movie HAS to be “dark” 2 be good’s a silly concept. Clone Wars & Rebels started out as more lighthearted themselves. Plus this has some of my fav actors on it, so that’s a plus along w/ the prev. crew.

@NolifeNoone I'll be honest, I'm not entirely interested in Resistance. Mainly because I don't really like the tone the show is going for. If it gets a bit darker and starts going for a Clone Wars/Rebels kind of tone, I'll give it a shot.
@PerfectHarb Do you plan on watching Resistance, this Sunday?
